alt_text: Spirit Power Baw Li Guhh Lang.jpg
img_above_text:
The main thing to remember when fighting Baw-Lu-Guhh-Lang or any other frog boss is to avoid getting caught behind it. The Double-Leg Kick can be devastating and is very sudden. Stick to its front where you can more easily predict its moves.
## Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang Spirit
img_below_text:
* **Tongue Whip**
* Equipped Effect: Moderately reduces the Stamina cost for Jumps and Jump Attacks.

img_summary: The image showcases the equipment menu in a video game, specifically highlighting the "Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang Spirit," an epic item with high Qi cost. Its ability, "Tongue Whip," allows the player to take the form of Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang and use a tongue attack to damage enemies from afar. The equipped effect reduces stamina costs for jumps and jump attacks. A demo option is available to preview the ability in action. The menu also displays other spirits and player stats.
